body: i’m thankful that though i dry heaved from advil on an empty stomach nausea in the parking lot of the gas station on the way to the airport, i did not really throw up. i’m thankful for dramamine and for flat water. i’m thankful for the cashier at the gas station, who was gently singing along to “with or without you,” which was playing on the radio.
